participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and cheerful, she enjoys connecting with others and values meaningful conversations.
participant_1.background: Emily is a marketing professional who loves to explore new ideas and cultures. She often engages in community service.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, he has a knack for bringing people together and loves to crack jokes.
participant_2.background: Michael is a software engineer with a passion for technology and gaming. He spends his free time hiking and playing board games.
